alert.note: Alert for Northern Panhandle (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 09 at 4:14PM MST until December 11 at 6:00AM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow is expected to develop late tonight into Saturday morning. Total snow accumulations between 3 and 7 inches. Above 3000 feet 7 to 14 inches of snow is expected. * WHERE...Athol, Eastport, Springdale-Hunters Road, Colville, Kettle Falls, Bonners Ferry, Deer Park, Chewelah, Newport, Schweitzer Mountain Road, Flowery Trail Road, Northport, Orin-Rice Road, Sandpoint, and Priest River. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 5 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
